title: Osgiliath River Crossing Battle: Death From Above - Third Age Total War: Reforged Mod Gameplay
description:
Osgiliath River Crossing Battle - Third Age Total War: Reforged Mod Gameplay - Hey guys!  Today we are going to witness a glorious river crossing battle at Osgiliath. The Dwarves, Elves, and Harad join forces against Arnor and Rhun.  The River will run red! Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
